statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Jaryn Johnson scored 24 points and Admassu Williams scored the winning free throws as Prairie View A&M edged Arkansas-Pine Bluff 57-55 on Saturday night.
article.headline: Prairie View A&M edges Arkansas-Pine Bluff 57-55
article.linkText: Prairie View A&M edges Arkansas-Pine Bluff 57-55
article.story: PINE BLUFF, Ark. -- Jaryn Johnson scored 24 points and Admassu Williams scored the winning free throws as Prairie View A&M edged Arkansas-Pine Bluff 57-55 on Saturday night. Johnson was 9 of 19 from the field including five 3-pointers for the Panthers (4-21, 4-9 Southwestern Athletic Conference) who had a 41-27 rebounding edge over Arkansas-Pine Bluff. Zachary Hamilton added 11 points and three boards. Johnson drained a 3-pointer to give the Panthers a 34-33 lead early in the second half and they stretched it to 50-45 on a tip-in by Ja'Donta Blakely with 6:16 to play. With the score tied 55-55, Williams sank two free throws to put Prairie View on top with 17 seconds remaining and they held on for the win. Arkansas-Pine Bluff committed 15 turnovers resulting in 19 points for Prairie View. Marcus Wallace scored 13 points for the Golden Lions (6-22, 4-10) in their third-straight loss.
